5 using namespace cv;

8 // Public
9 IPM::IPM( const cv::Size& _origSize, const cv::Size& _dstSize, const std::vector<cv::Point2f>& _origPoints, const std::vector<cv::Point2f>& _dstPoints )
10  : m_origSize(_origSize), m_dstSize(_dstSize), m_origPoints(_origPoints), m_dstPoints(_dstPoints)
11 {
12  assert( m_origPoints.size() == 4 && m_dstPoints.size() == 4 && "Orig. points and Dst. points must vectors of 4 points" );
13  m_H = getPerspectiveTransform( m_origPoints, m_dstPoints );
14  m_H_inv = m_H.inv();
15 
16  createMaps();
17 }
18 
19 void IPM::applyHomography(const Mat& _inputImg, Mat& _dstImg, int _borderMode)
20 {
21  // Generate IPM image from src
22  remap(_inputImg, _dstImg, m_mapX, m_mapY, INTER_LINEAR, _borderMode);//, BORDER_CONSTANT, Scalar(0,0,0,0));
23 }
24 
25 void IPM::applyHomographyInv(const Mat& _inputImg, Mat& _dstImg, int _borderMode)
26 {
27  // Generate IPM image from src
28  remap(_inputImg, _dstImg, m_invMapX, m_invMapY, INTER_LINEAR, _borderMode);//, BORDER_CONSTANT, Scalar(0,0,0,0));
29 }
30 
31 Point2d IPM::applyHomography( const Point2d& _point, const Mat& _H )
32 {
33  Point2d ret = Point2d( -1, -1 );
34 
35  const double u = _H.at<double>(0,0) * _point.x + _H.at<double>(0,1) * _point.y + _H.at<double>(0,2);
36  const double v = _H.at<double>(1,0) * _point.x + _H.at<double>(1,1) * _point.y + _H.at<double>(1,2);
37  const double s = _H.at<double>(2,0) * _point.x + _H.at<double>(2,1) * _point.y + _H.at<double>(2,2);
38  if ( s != 0 )
39  {
40  ret.x = ( u / s );
41  ret.y = ( v / s );
42  }
43  return ret;
44 }
45 
46 // Private
47 void IPM::createMaps()
48 {
49  // Create remap images
50  m_mapX.create(m_dstSize, CV_32F);
51  m_mapY.create(m_dstSize, CV_32F);
52  for( int j = 0; j < m_dstSize.height; ++j )
53  {
54  float* ptRowX = m_mapX.ptr<float>(j);
55  float* ptRowY = m_mapY.ptr<float>(j);
56  for( int i = 0; i < m_dstSize.width; ++i )
57  {
58  Point2f pt = applyHomography( Point2f( static_cast<float>(i), static_cast<float>(j) ), m_H_inv );
59  ptRowX[i] = pt.x;
60  ptRowY[i] = pt.y;
61  }
62  }
63 
64  m_invMapX.create(m_origSize, CV_32F);
65  m_invMapY.create(m_origSize, CV_32F);
66 
67  for( int j = 0; j < m_origSize.height; ++j )
68  {
69  float* ptRowX = m_invMapX.ptr<float>(j);
70  float* ptRowY = m_invMapY.ptr<float>(j);
71  for( int i = 0; i < m_origSize.width; ++i )
72  {
73  Point2f pt = applyHomography( Point2f( static_cast<float>(i), static_cast<float>(j) ), m_H );
74  ptRowX[i] = pt.x;
75  ptRowY[i] = pt.y;
76  }
77  }
78 
79 }
